item.title: How to Erase Your Information Online
item.description: Linus Torvalds Being Based How Do I Remove Sensitive Information Online? I made a post on Lemmy recently and received a lot of negative feedback for requesting on advice on how to remove my information or just straight up not use my physical home address and instead maybe a PO box. After all the feedback I got, I decided that this wouldn’t be possible. Also, it might not even be the bank that leaked my information but my government.
